column2: SOLARIS HEPPA v3.2 1850-2300 transient and 1850-1873 mean datasets
Take annual mean of total solar irradiance in transient dataset and subtract the 1850-1873 period mean.
Multiply this quantity by 0.25 * 0.7 (planetary view factor * planetary co-albedo).
Years prior to 1850 revert to the IPCC Annex II solar forcing. Years after 2300 set to zero.
